alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 29 at 11:19PM EDT until August 30 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers may be heavily swamped by waves. * WHERE...Allegan and Van Buren counties. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous waves and currents will persist both tonight and into Wednesday along the Lake Michigan shoreline. North sides of north piers will be dangerous places to swim.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions and do not venture out on piers. Please check with your local authorities on potential beach closures.
